transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Sir very good afternoon. Main Ankita baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART team se.
Customer: Hello. Sir actually mere pass ek feedback receive hua hai ki aap IndiaMART ki services se satisfied nahi hai.
Executive: Jaan sakti hu main aapko kya help kar sakti hu kya pareshani aa rahi hai services mein?
Customer: Mera jo product catalog mein advertisement kiya.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Hello. Main jo advertisement kiya uska ha uska inquiry mere pass nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Sir aapne jo product IndiaMART pe add kar rakhe hain. Fish feed supplement ya aquarium air pump air pump is tarike ki category hai.
Executive: Aur aapne last six month mein 500 ke around leads is category se consume bhi ki hai.
Customer: Main jo bol raha hai aap so suniye aap log baat baat jyada bolta hai. Baat sunta nahi hai aap log ka it's sabse bada problem hai.
Customer: Hum kya bola hai aapko?
Customer: Jo mera catalog ka jo specific inquiry aata hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Mera catalog ka jo specific inquiry aata hai jo mera brand name ka hai grand 16000 hai grand 12000 grand 10000 uska inquiry mere pass nahi aa raha hai. Wo log aap by lead mein transfer kar le rahe hain.
Customer: To mera jo product hai wo to mera specialist product hai wo to aise nahi hai 100 aadmi wo sell karta hai. To wo product ke main itna rupya deke advertisement karne ke baad mere pass nahi aayega to main kyu advertise karenge aapka platform mein.
Executive: Okay. Sir main aapko batana chahungi hum kisi bhi specific brand ko nahi product promote karte hain hum category ko promote karte hain. To aapka jo brand hai brand mein baat kar raha hai main main to advertise kar raha hai na mera catalog ka.
Executive: Ji sir aur hum bhi aapke product advertise hi kar rahe hain. Main catalog main India IndiaMART mein main kyu diya platform mein mera product main kyu diya kyu aap log ko itna rupya deta hai. Saale wo promotion nahi hoga to main kyu advertise denge aapke pass.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: [unintelligible] is tarah din paisa nahi hai paisa nahi hai to pata hai na product.
Executive: Sir main aapko batana chahungi aapko. Promotion hi to nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Sir promotion nahi ho raha hai de-promotion ho raha hai.
Executive: Sir kaise de-promotion ho raha hai guide karne ke liye kya abhi aap available hai main thoda aapko google meeting pe connect ho sakti hu?
Customer: Connect karke koi fayda nahi hai aap jo bol rahe hain wo pehle aap samjhaye. Mera jo product hai mere pass inquiry aayenge to mera catalog mein koi search kiya show kiya koi customer show kiya mera product ko to inquiry to mere pass aani chahiye na itna din to aise hi hota tha.
Customer: Abhi last teen mahine mein suniye last teen mahina mein mera product ka inquiry mere pass nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Theek hai?
Executive: Okay. Sir last teen month mein jo inquiry aapki rahi hai pehle aapko 372 429 inquiry aap quantity kyu kar rahe hain aap log?
Customer: Quantity mein kya hota hai hota hai business aata hai ki nahi aata hai. Quantity ke deke ki hum khana pi ke ye karke pi ke khayenge quantity quantity baat karta hai aap log.
Executive: Sir I am not saying about the quantity. Jaam mein nahi jata hai aap log sabse bada sabse bada baat hai hum log pura jhoota baat karke jaam mein nahi jata hai dusra karke customer ko convince karta hai are hum log bhi marketing ke aadmi hai.
Customer: To hum log ko kyu itna dusra baat karke inquiry abhi bhi aa rahi hai. Sir nahi aa raha hai nahi aa raha hai jo aata hai sab jhoot inquiry hai jo mera product ka hi nahi hai product related koi inquiry abhi nahi inquiry hai wo log aap log by list mein transfer kar deta hai.
Customer: Brand nahi baat kar raha hai mera product jo catalog ka advertisement kiya uska baat kar raha hai.
Executive: Sir agar buyer inquiry dalega to buyer ke end pe right hai na wo kisi ko bhi inquiry de sakta hai aur aapke pass bhi inquiry aa rahi hai sir. Aapke pass pehle bhi inquiry aa rahi hai. Dijiye mere pass nahi denge main nahi advertisement karenge aapke through mein. Theek hai? Aapke pass 400 se 500 inquiry aa rahi hai. Nahi advertisement karenge koi paisa kamai nahi aa raha hai mere IndiaMART se ek rupya kamai nahi aa raha hai. Theek hai? Aap log kamai ka rasta nahi de rahe aap kyu ROI nahi hoga ROI nahi hoga to hum aapko further investment karenge aapka piche. Aapka kam hai kya hai aapka bhi investment. Wahi to bol raha hai mera inquiry mera product ka inquiry mere pass nahi aa raha hai. Aap log wo by list mein transfer kar de raha hai.
Executive: Aapne ye bola jo bola ki aapke product ki aapko inquiry nahi aa rahi hai theek hai? Nahi aa raha hai. Main nahi bola sir. Main to bar bar yahi bol raha hai aap log koi samjha hi nahi. Nahi aa raha hai bar bar ek hi baat kar rahe hain aap aapka jo Prashant hai aapka jo Prashant hai usko bhi bataya. Bar bar bata raha hai nahi aa raha hai. Aapke pass nahi aa raha hai koi pura district inquiry hai aap log ka service leke nahi aa raha hai. Main jo jo product bol raha hai uske koi inquiry mere pass nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Accha sir aap fish breeding machine sale karte hain? Mera jo product hai aap fish breeding machine sale karte hain fish breeding machine.
Customer: Do unnecessary jo paisa 200 rupya ka dam hai wo product leke aap log baat karta hai. Jo 10000 product uske liye baat nahi karta hai. To unnecessary aap log baat karta hai jo specific main jo baat kar raha hai uske baat bari hai usko boliye grand 16000 hai grand 12000 hai grand 10000 hai.
Executive: Aquarium air pumps ki 100 inquiry aayi hai. Baat samajh mein nahi aata hai aap log ko samajh mein nahi aata hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving inquiries for specific brand products.

- Feels inquiries are transferred to by-list.

- Dissatisfied with ROI from IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive explained they promote categories, not specific brands.

- Executive mentioned customer received inquiries in the past.

- Offered a Google Meeting to guide the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Angry



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, advertisement, inquiry, promotion
